backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with authorization, user profiles, hotel/ticket/trip comparison types, and profile query logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a UI update requirement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with the TripTally page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, global layout, theming, and top-level application routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and profile redirection.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Unauthenticated sign‑in screen showing branding, a fixed “Welcome to EOA” heading, and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Chat panel UI for displaying, scrolling, and sending messages with enter‑to‑send behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with top navigation and footer, updating the document title based on routing and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with branding, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Displays the main navigation bar with branding, route links, profile access, login, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Shows a grid of photos with options to tag people or delete each photo, handling empty states and tag display.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Provides an image upload interface with progress tracking and mutation-based upload handling.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Modal panel for adding, removing, and saving manual people tags on a photo using friends or principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: Lets users add, edit, and remove hotel listings with room and pricing details, updating the parent collection.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: UI component for adding, editing, and deleting ticket options with fields for name, type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Editor for creating and managing VIP packages including price, currency, inclusions, and perks.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Displays a travel bundle’s ticket, hotel, VIP details, and total pricing with per‑person breakdown.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Sort bar allowing users to choose sorting options like price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gates purchase‑related UI behind authentication and parental consent checks with a confirmation workflow.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Central branding config defining app name, tagline, and logo asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, friends, trip comparisons, albums, groups, and messaging using the actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates trip bundles by combining tickets, hotels, VIP packages, and room types with cost calculations.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Computes check-in and check-out timestamps based on a concert date and buffer days.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays an album with photos, allows uploading and deleting, and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details with chat, lets users post messages or leave the group.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups, supports creating new groups, and handles unauthenticated access.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing branding, a hero section, feature steps, and navigation buttons to the trip builder or saved comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Displays user photo albums with create‑album dialog, handling auth, loading states, and navigation to individual albums.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile info and saved trip comparisons with delete actions, including auth and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates and sorts travel bundles from trip data, displays bundle results, and provides save and navigation actions.
Lists saved trip comparisons with delete options, handling auth, loading, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: React page that captures event, travel, and offer details, manages form state, and navigates to results after validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling across the frontend.
